group_1.narration: I came to Kamihama City to pick out@a cute date outfit, and ran into this girl.
Her name was Emiri Kisaki. She told me@she's aiming to be the cutest in the world.
She wanted to help me pick an outfit@out, so here I am, going along with her.
I got a big surprise when we finally@got around to introducing ourselves!

group_1.textLeft: Yes I am!

group_1.textRight: For real? Two in one day...

group_1.textLeft: Oh, it's totally normal in Kamihama!@There's like, a BAJILLION Magical Girls!
Hey, hey! Whaddaya think about this dress?!
Right? RIGHT? And this is the new "in"@color for this year!

group_1.textRight: A new color... Do you mean the salmon pink?

group_1.textLeft: No way! Absolutely NOT salmon pink!
It's SWEET pink, got it?!

group_1.textRight: Sweet...pink... Is this what sweet pink@looked like?

group_1.textLeft: It's the hottest color right now![chara:300601:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:300601:cheek_0][chara:300601:face_mtn_ex_020.exp.json][chara:300601:lipSynch_1] It's gonna@be huge!
Yep! For sweet, candylicious gals! It's got@that devilish look that guys love!

group_1.textRight: [chara:200401:effect_emotion_sad_0][se:7224_fall_into]Huh... I'm not sure I look right in pink...

group_1.textLeft: Hey now, don't say that.
Here, if you wear this hat with it, oh and @accessorize with this bag...
Now you're shining with sweet pink style!

Oh my god! It looks sooo good on you![chara:300601:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:300601:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy][chara:300601:cheek_0][chara:300601:face_mtn_ex_011.exp.json][chara:300601:lipSynch_1] @Sayakyan, you look like a total doll!
Let's get you some pink shoes to match! @Oh, and your lips and nails have to be pink!
Then you'll be like, a sweet pink festival!

group_1.textRight: I'm not so sure about this... I think I'd@like something, um less flashy?

group_1.textLeft: Less flashy?
I see. Well in that case...
Okay, let's check out this place!
How about this?

group_1.textRight: That one's sweet pink as well!

group_1.textLeft: Um, no it isn't? It's definitely bitter pink!@A way more mature, muted shade of pink!
Come on, try it on, try it on! The road to@cute is a tough one, girl!

group_1.textRight: Maybe it's TOO tough for me...
